StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: NHLBI TOPMed: Heart and Vascular Health Study

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS AT CHICAGOUNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO

Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
The TOPMed acknowledgement statement can be found at: https://topmed.nhlbi.nih.gov/acknowledgements.
In addition the acknowledgment of the Heart and Vascular Health Study should always include the statement below, along with the relevant dbGaP accession number(s):
"The research reported in this article was supported by grants HL068986, HL085251, HL095080, and HL073410 from the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute. This manuscript was not prepared in collaboration with Heart and Vascular Health (HVH) Study investigators, and does not necessarily reflect the opinions or views of the HVH Study or the NHLBI."
Policy.ic_specific_access_term:
There are two consent groups for this study: (1) HMB-IRB-MDS and (2) DS-CVD-IRB-MDS. (1) For HMB-IRB-MDS: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval (please note only full or expedited approvals will be accepted). Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
(2) For DS-CVD-IRB-MDS - Use of the data must be related to Cardiovascular Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval (please note only full or expedited approvals will be accepted). Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-IRB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Exchange Area
ConsentGroup.name: EA-IRB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use by NHLBI WGS study investigators only There are two consent groups - Health/Medical/Biomedical (HMB-IRB-MDS) and Disease-Specific Cardiovascular (DS-CVD-IRB-MDS). For HMB-IRB-MDS: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval (please note only full or expedited approvals will be accepted). Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
For DS-CVD-IRB-MDS - Use of the data must be related to Cardiovascular Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval (please note only full or expedited approvals will be accepted). Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cardiovascular Disease, IRB, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CVD-IRB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cardiovascular Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
